AL-FURQAN

Quran was revealed to the last of the Prophets, Muhammad (peace and blessings be upon him).
The first word revealed to the Prophet (peace and blessings be upon him) from Allah, through Angel Jibreel (Archangel Gabriel) was : "READ".
Note: Muhammad ( peace and blessings be upon him) was illiterate, couldn't read, nor write.
Jibreel said: "Read".
Muhammad(peace and blessings be upon him) responded: "I do not know how to read".
Thereupon the angel caught hold of him and embraced him heavily. This happened two more times after which he commanded him to recite following verses:

"Read, in the name of your Lord who created, man from a clinging substance.
Read: Your Lord is the Most Generous,-
He who taught by the pen - Taught man that which he knew not."


Story of revelation of the verses Narration from the Prophet: Sahih Al-Bukhari
